page.title: 16Going for a Walk
page.content: Translation page 3 We see nature of all kinds when we walk through the fields.We see birds busily carrying food to their nests in the hedges,bushes and trees.We do not see many nests in the hedges now because the hedge cutters destroy them.In the woods we see the homes of badgers,foxes and rabbits.The number of these are falling because people hunt and gas them.The cattle,sheep and horses are kept in the fields.They enjoy grazing the grass.In winter they are kept in a shed and eat hay and silage.Around the fields on the hedges we san see thorn bushes growing,their white blossom look like sparkling pearls in the distance.The leaves sway gently in the breeze and in the Autumn ther is a carpet of multicoloured leaves.
